faqs.question: Is my participation anonymous?
faqs.answer: Yes. We never share personally identifiable information without your explicit consent.

faqs.question: How do you use my feedback?
faqs.answer: Community input directly influences which stories we pursue and how we cover them.

faqs.question: Can I submit a story tip?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Use our secure submission form to share information or documents.

faqs.question: How do you verify submissions?
faqs.answer: Our editorial team follows strict verification protocols before publishing any content.
